name: Microsoft
description: Microsoft enables digital transformation in the era of an intelligent cloud and an intelligent edge. Microsoft operates in 190 countries and is made up of more than 220,000 passionate employees worldwide. Microsoft set up its India operations in 1990. Microsoft in India offers its global cloud services from local data centers to accelerate digital transformation across Indian start-ups, businesses, and government agencies. Highlights.name: Intelligent Cloud for India
Highlights.description: We partner with governments, as well as private and public institutions to develop cloud-based technological solutions to digitally transform every sector in India.

Highlights.name: Trust & Security
Highlights.description: Microsoft’s approach to cybersecurity in today’s cloud-centric world rests on three core functional areas: protect, detect, and respond.

Highlights.name: Innovation and AI for All
Highlights.description: Our partners use our cognitive services, IoT, and machine learning models to create inclusive solutions designed to solve societal and business problems.

enhanced_description: Microsoft is a global technology leader enabling digital transformation through its intelligent cloud and intelligent edge platforms. Operating in 190 countries with over 220,000 employees, Microsoft has a significant presence in India, providing global cloud services from local data centers to accelerate digital transformation for Indian start-ups, businesses, and government agencies across every sector. The company focuses on developing cloud-based technological solutions, maintaining a robust cybersecurity approach (protect, detect, and respond), and fostering innovation through AI, cognitive services, IoT, and machine learning models to solve societal and business problems. Additionally, Microsoft offers specialized software and services related to Human Resources, including applications of machine learning in HR.
